Paragraph: We have recently demonstrated that disruption of extracellular matrix ( ECM ) / integrin signaling via elimination of integrin - linked kinase ( ILK ) in hepatocytes interferes with signals leading to termination of liver regeneration .

| liver regeneration |

The paragraph does not mention any specific disease entities. The focus is on the process of liver regeneration and how disrupting extracellular matrix (ECM)/integrin signaling via elimination of integrin-linked kinase (ILK) in hepatocytes interferes with the signals leading to the termination of liver regeneration. Therefore, the only disease-related entity in the paragraph is "liver regeneration" which is not a disease in the classical sense but rather a natural process of the liver to regenerate itself.
